Languages: Understands Common and Celestial but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Ethereal Form
Traits.Content: Grey Nun can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

Traits.Name: Aura of Sorrow
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of the Grey Nun must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the Grey Nun fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Grey Nun makes two attacks with Grasp of Desolation and one attack with Wail of the Lost.

Actions.Name: Grasp of Desolation
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +20 to hit, dealing 30 (5d10 + 3) necrotic damage. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or have their maximum hit points reduced by the damage taken until they finish a long rest.

Actions.Name: Wail of the Lost
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +20 to hit, dealing 63 (10d10 + 8) psychic damage. The creature must make a DC 24 saving throw or suffer the incapacitated condition until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Veil of Sorrow
Actions.Content: The Grey Nun emits a 30-foot radius aura of despair. Each creature within range must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 85 (16d10) psychic damage or half as much on a successful save. Creatures that fail the save are also frightened until the end of their next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Eerie Presence Legendary Action (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Grey Nun can invoke her unnatural aura. For the next turn, all creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of her must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on their attack rolls against her.

LegendaryActions.Name: Consume Sorrow Legendary Action (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Grey Nun targets one creature within 60 feet. The target must make a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is paralyzed until the end of their next turn, as they are overwhelmed with visions of despair.

LegendaryActions.Name: Spectral Approach Legendary Action (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Grey Nun moves up to her flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks. When she moves this way, she can pass through creatures and objects, dealing 80 (15d10) necrotic damage to any creature she ends her movement within. Affected creatures must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of their next turn.
